name: Alfa Chemistry - Cholesterol (CAS 57-88-5)
description: Alfa Chemistry supplies cosmetic-grade cholesterol for anti-aging and moisturizing applications. Their cholesterol functions as a moisturizer and emollient that softens and smooths skin while improving the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Essential component for barrier repair formulations and stratum corneum lipid restoration.
notes: Focus on anti-aging and moisturizing applications. Softens and smooths skin while addressing fine lines and wrinkles. Essential for barrier repair and lipid matrix restoration. Chemical supplier with cosmetic ingredient portfolio.
specializations: Improves appearance of fine lines and wrinkles
notes: Alfa Chemistry offers cholesterol (CAS 57-88-5) as a moisturizer and emollient that softens and smooths skin. Improves appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Applications in anti-aging and moisturizing formulations. US-based chemical supplier.
